functions.name: set_keyboard_color
functions.description: Set the color of the keyboard or RGB device using OpenRGB.

color.description: The color to set (e.g., red, green, blue, etc.)

functions.name: list_supported_colors
functions.description: List all supported color names for keyboard/device lighting.

functions.name: configure_color_feedback
functions.description: Configure color feedback for event proximity (e.g., none, near, imminent) and assign a color to each mode.

mode.description: The feedback mode to configure (none, near, imminent)

color.description: The color to assign to this mode (must be a supported color)

functions.name: auto_color_update
functions.description: Automatically update keyboard/device color based on event proximity in the calendar (uses color feedback configuration).
